result.execSummary:
Jeffrey Alan Schumacher was extradited to another county, state or jurisdiction. Extradition means Jeffrey Alan Schumacher was accused or convicted of an offense in another county, state or jurisdiction and was taken there to face their charge(s) or conviction.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

charges.descr: Extradition-Arrest Prior to Requisition - Rockford IL

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Jeffrey Alan Schumacher

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Attorney Richard L. Jones in court.  Gerald A. Urbik appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Minutes filed, deft not in custody.

Defendant Jeffrey Alan Schumacher in court in custody with attorney Richard L Jones.  Scott H. Dirks appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Minutes filed, deft waives extradition rights.  Further proceedings scheduled for March 5, 2014 at 01:15 pm.

Defendant Jeffrey Alan Schumacher in court in custody with attorney Richard L Jones.  Lindsay Healless appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Minutes filed, continued.  Extradition hearing scheduled for February 18, 2014 at 08:30 am.
